title: android Stack
content:
# Android Stack


### The layers of the stack in order are:

- Apps
- Java API framework
- Libraries and Android Runtime
- Hardware abstraction layer (HAL)
- Linux kernel


## Javas APi Framework
- UI Components
- Resource Manager
- Notification Manager
- Activity Manager 
- Contents Provider
- Android Runtime




## Hardware abstraction layer (HAL)
- Device hardwarre
- Via APi Framework
